4th International Workshop on

Search-Based Software Testing

March, 2011, Berlin, Germany

In conjunction with ICST 2011

IEEE International Conference on Testing, Verification and Validation

Welcome & Call for papers | Important Dates | Paper Submission | Prizes | Program Committee | Keynote | Program | ICST 2011

Submission Information

Submission of papers is handled through EasyChair. Submission site is now open, and reachable at this link.

Formatting

The proceedings will appear in the IEEE digital library.

Paper format is the same as for the "Research Track" papers for ICST 2011. Full papers should not exceed 10 pages, whereas the limit is 4 pages for short papers. For instructions on preparing your submission in accordance with the IEEE two-column proceedings format, please follow the links from ICST 2011.


If you have any queries, please contact the program chair: Andrea Arcuri email:
